files.title: Overview
files.summary: The value of the sparsity selector selects the sub-columns in the Tensor Memory to form the sparsity metadata matrix, which is used with matrix `A` to form the multiplicand matrix.

files.title: tcgen05-sparse-matrices-sparsity-selector-kind-f16-m64
files.summary: [Figure 262](https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/parallel-thread-execution/#tcgen05-sparse-matrices-sparsity-selector-kind-f16-m64-dig) shows which sub-columns gets selected for different values of Sparsity Selector.
